title: Complaints to NYC Council Constituent Services — nycomplaints
Complaints to NYC Council Constituent Services — nycomplaints
text: data frame 240,027 rows 11 variables: unique_key character Complaint identifier. account character NYC Council District created casework, may district constituent lives . opendate date Date casework created staff. closedate date Close Date date casework closed. casework closed issue resolved action taken. complaint_type character Broader category designated staff constituent casework. complaint_type corresponds NYC Council Legislative Committees. descriptor character Specific category designated staff constituent casework. zip integer Zip code constituent. borough character Borough constituent. city character City constituent. council_dist Council District constituent. community_board Community Board constituent.

title: Complaints to NYC Council Constituent Services — nycomplaints

However, district staffs handle wide range complex issues. offices uses program differently, thus records cases, differently comparisons accounts may difficult. offices use program. info - http://labs.council.nyc/districts/data/
